entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 2:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon except a few wet flurries inland. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
